content.processed:
At present, donating any funds can be very helpful. In general, support for any areas and fields affected or exhausted by the pandemic is welcomed.

For example, this can be financial support for medical staff in hospitals and social facilities or support for school facilities to purchase electronic equipment for online teaching. There are several projects and initiatives. But think carefully and choose to whom you ultimately donate money. Even during a pandemic, there are a number of people who might take advantage of your good intentions.
